meanings.definition: The act of reflecting or the state of being reflected.
meanings.sent1: Looking at her reflexion in the mirror, she fixed her hair.
meanings.sent2: The lake showed a clear reflexion of the mountains in the distance.
meanings.sent3: His reflexion in the window made him realize he had lipstick on his teeth.
meanings.sent4: The city lights created a beautiful reflexion on the water's surface.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the reflexion of the sunset in her painting.

meanings.definition: A thought occurring in consideration or meditation.
meanings.sent1: Her reflexion on the matter led her to a decision.
meanings.sent2: During her reflexion, she found a solution to the problem.
meanings.sent3: His reflexion on what to have for dinner was interrupted by a loud noise.
meanings.sent4: In her reflexion, she discovered a new perspective on the issue.
meanings.sent5: The reflexion on her past mistakes helped her grow as a person.

meanings.sent1: The reflexion of the tree in the pond looked like a painting.
meanings.sent2: The camera captured a perfect reflexion of the bridge in the water.
meanings.sent3: The distorted reflexion in the funhouse mirror made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The reflexion of the moon on the lake was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a beautiful reflexion of the city skyline.

meanings.sent1: The reflexion of the light off the glass created a rainbow.
meanings.sent2: The reflexion of the road in the mirror made it look longer.
meanings.sent3: The reflexion of the paper airplane showed it flying backwards.
meanings.sent4: The reflexion of the fabric made it seem like it was moving.
meanings.sent5: The reflexion of the ribbon gave the illusion of a loop.
